channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- MStore API
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- MStore API

item.title: CVE-2023-3077|2024-08-02T06:41:04.132Z -- unknown -- mstore%20api
item.description: The MStore API WordPress plugin before 3.9.8 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a Blind SQL injection exploitable by unauthenticated users. This is only exploitable if the site owner elected to pay to get access to the plugins' pro features, and uses the woocommerce-appointments plugin.

item.title: CVE-2023-3209|2024-08-02T06:48:07.960Z -- unknown -- mstore%20api
item.description: The MStore API WordPress plugin before 3.9.7 does not secure most of its AJAX actions by implementing privilege checks, nonce checks, or a combination of both.

item.title: CVE-2023-3131|2024-08-02T06:48:07.151Z -- unknown -- mstore%20api
item.description: The MStore API WordPress plugin before 3.9.7 does not secure most of its AJAX actions by implementing privilege checks, nonce checks, or a combination of both.

item.title: CVE-2023-3076|2024-08-02T06:41:04.151Z -- unknown -- mstore%20api
item.description: The MStore API WordPress plugin before 3.9.9 does not prevent visitors from creating user accounts with the role of their choice via their wholesale REST API endpoint. This is only exploitable if the site owner paid to access the plugin's pro features.
